{"value":{"role":"MAIN","node":{"image":{"large":"https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/character/large/b145345-zyirrSsKIDCb.png"},"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/character/145345","description":"__Height:__ 185cm (6'1")

Draken is Mikey's best friend and one of the founders of Toman.

Draken is a serious teen who lives in a brothel, he does not know his biological parents and was 'taken in' by the owners of the brothel. ~!His mother was a prostitute who abandoned him at birth and died when he was two years old.!~

~!In the future, Draken owns a bike shop, and is a member of Brahman.!~","name":{"full":"Ken Ryuuguji"},"id":145345},"media":[{"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/anime/120120","title":{"romaji":"Tokyo Revengers","english":"Tokyo Revengers"}}]},"expires":null}

{"value":{"role":"MAIN","node":{"image":{"large":"https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/character/large/b88264-LkEXW9eVWs9s.jpg"},"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/character/88264","description":"Stella Vermillion is an A-rank Apprentice Knight and princess of the Vermillion Kingdom. She is a young girl with long vermilion hair tied in twintails and crimson eyes, average height and has large breasts and a voluptuous figure.

Stella initially appears to be feisty, hot-blooded, and quick to anger possibly due to her sheltered upbringing. However, later she is shown to be anything but bitter, and is even willing to admit her mistakes and be friendly with others. Despite this, she exhibits frequent bouts of jealousy especially when it comes to Ikki.

Stella gets agitated whenever anyone says that she is strong because she is an "A Rank" and do not see all her hard work, but Ikki Kurogane was the only one to see Stella's hard work which was one of the reasons Stella started developing feelings for him.

(Source: Rakudai Kishi no Cavalry Wikia)","name":{"full":"Stella  Vermillion"},"id":88264},"media":[{"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/anime/21092","title":{"romaji":"Rakudai Kishi no Cavalry","english":"Chivalry of a Failed Knight"}}]},"expires":null}

{"value":{"role":"MAIN","node":{"image":{"large":"https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/character/large/b89005-qbay3j2JIUba.jpg"},"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/character/89005","description":"Ayame is the Vice-President of the Student Council and daughter of a disgraced former Diet member who unsuccessfully fought against the public morality laws. Ayame secretly acts outside of school as the perverted terrorist Blue Snow (also known as Blue Tundra), wearing panties over her face, spreading semi-pornographic leaflets, and shouting dirty jokes in defiance of the Japanese moral authorities. After kidnapping Tanukichi, she decides to form the group SOX with him and expand her activities to include the school.","name":{"full":"Ayame Kajou"},"id":89005},"media":[{"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/anime/20910","title":{"romaji":"Shimoneta to Iu Gainen ga Sonzai Shinai Taikutsu na Sekai","english":"SHIMONETA: A Boring World Where the Concept of Dirty Jokes Doesn’t Exist"}}]},"expires":null}

{"value":{"role":"MAIN","node":{"image":{"large":"https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/character/large/b142905-7uicwpbDfyZd.jpg"},"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/character/142905","description":"Yoruka Kirihime is one of the female protagonists of the Anime
She was the princess of the fallen nation of Koto, later becoming an assassin for the Old Arcadia Empire and then a student of the New Kingdom's Royal Officer Academy.

Personality:
Yoruka is a cold ruthless assassin when it's necessary but also kind when serving her "Master" (Lux Arcadia) 
She has introverted until she starts to talk to Lux.

History:
Yoruka was a princess but since the age of 5, she has a natural talent for killing.
At that age, a male assassin was sent to kill her but it has resulted in his death with her using a bamboo skewer to the throat as a killing technique.
Because of that, she lost her status as a princess, and when his father died her brother has succeeded the throne and she had become a royal guard to him. 
He tried to treat her as a human more than a weapon and they even swore oaths to protect him and become a splendid lord.
Koto (The land this was happening and the place where her brother is the king) got into a war with the old arcadia empire resulting in Yoruka becoming an empire assassin however the chief vassals of Koto had already given up the war and blame her brother resulting in him being killed by decapitation and presented his head to the Empire.
Yoruka had done various tasks but she was eventually imprisoned on an uninhabited island and then send to hibernation on a pod.
5 years later she woke up by Hayes Vi Arcadia and then she trained on the island until Dobar Fest (the manager of the island) have taken her without hayes knowing to a group of mercenaries. 
Yoruka is then ordered to break the door of the Abyss and some stuff happens that makes her meet Airi and make her decide to visit Lux in a later time.

","name":{"full":"Yoruka Kirihime"},"id":142905},"media":[{"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/anime/21188","title":{"romaji":"Saijaku Muhai no Bahamut","english":"Undefeated Bahamut Chronicle"}}]},"expires":null}

{"value":{"role":"MAIN","node":{"image":{"large":"https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/character/large/89267-dINSPCXGPjGT.jpg"},"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/character/89267","description":"Yukiko is always full of energy and positive thinking, which makes her quite an odd couple with her boyfriend Tsuyoshi. She loves cosplaying and has very good interpersonal skills. She goes to a different school than all the main characters.","name":{"full":"Yukiko Asai"},"id":89267},"media":[{"siteUrl":"https://anilist.co/anime/21292","title":{"romaji":"Nijiiro Days","english":"Rainbow Days"}}]},"expires":null}

She was formerly affiliated with 81 Produce, but is now affiliated with Pro-Fit.","url":"https://anilist.co/staff/118738","timestamp":null,"color":null,"fields":[],"thumbnail":{"url":"https://s4.anilist.co/file/anilistcdn/staff/large/n118738-60gKflxjl80c.png"},"image":null,"author":null,"footer":null},"expires":null}

{"value":{"title":"Bokutachi no Remake","type":"rich","description":"Life is not going well for 28-year-old Kyouya Hashiba. Having left his office job to pursue a career in the video game industry, his internship at a popular game studio abruptly ends, leaving him unemployed and forcing him to move back in with his parents. Additionally, his jealousy towards the success of the "Platinum Generation"—a group of similarly-aged creators—has caused him to regret his decision to attend a traditional university instead of an arts college. Even though he believes there are no second chances in life, Kyouya is suddenly given one when he wakes up one day and finds himself 10 years in the past.

Instead of choosing business school like he originally had, Kyouya decides to pursue his passions and attends the Oonaka University of Art. There, he meets classmate Eiko Kawasegawa, the woman who had hired him as an intern in the present, alongside his new housemates and future Platinum Generation members: underachieving artist Aki Shino, aspiring singer and actress Nanako Kogure, and naturally-gifted writer Tsurayuki Rokuonji.

With each project they complete together, Kyouya and his friends venture closer to discovering their true potential as creators and remaking their lives into the ideal versions they desire.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]","url":"https://myanimelist.net/anime/40904","timestamp":null,"color":2292736,"fields":[{"name":"::notes: Opening Themes","value":""Koko kara Saki wa Uta ni Naranai (ここから先は歌にならない)" by Poppin'Party
","inline":true},{"name":"::notes: Ending Themes","value":""Kanousei (可能性)" by Argonavis
